    • addProducer

      public String addProducer(String name, String url, int playBack, int playTime, int opt)
      This method allows to add a producer either artist or content creator(influencer)
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the producer
      url - the image that will have
      playBack - the atribute of accumaliton of productions
      playTime - the total time played
      opt - what the user choose, if the producer will be artist or influencer
      Returns:
      a message whit the status if the user was o wan't added.

    • addAudioSong

      public String addAudioSong(String name, String audioName, String urlAudio, int m, int s, int repNum, String album, double saleValue, int soldNum, int gender)
      This method allows the user to add audio of type song
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the producer that will belongs the audio, most be created and be artist.
      audioName - name of the audio
      urlAudio - url image off the auio
      m - the minutes of the song
      s - the seconds of the song
      repNum - the atribute of the reproductions
      album - the album were the song will belongs
      saleValue - the price of the song if it will be saled
      soldNum - the atribute of number of times that the song will be sold
      gender - the gender of the song, must choose one: rock, pop, trap or house
      Returns:
      a message with the status of what happend.

    • addAudioPodCast

      public String addAudioPodCast(String nickName, String audioName, String urlAudio, int h, int m, int s, int repNum, String description, int category)
      This methos allows to create an audio of type podcast
      Parameters:
      nickName - the name of the producer that will belongs the podcat, must be a
      audioName - the name of the audio in this case, pocast
      urlAudio - the url image of the podcast
      h - the hours that could have the podcast
      m - the minutes
      s - and the seconds that could have
      repNum - an atribute of the number of repetions
      description - a short describtion that the audio will have
      category - the category of the song, must choose one. Could be: politic, entertaiment, videogamer or fashion
      Returns:
